snippet.title: Yamasa Digi World: Collaboration SP Pachi-Slot Ridge Racer - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
In 2008, Bandai Namco once made a collaboration with Yamasa, which lead to the creation of this Japan exclusive slot machine simulator for the PlayStation 2.

Ridge Racer (C) Bandai Namco
Yamasa Digi, Yamasa Digi World (C) Yamasa

#retrogames #retrogaming #playstation2 #ps2 #ps2games #ridgeracer #yamasa #yamasadigi #yamasadigiworld #slotmachine #pachislot #fruitmachine #namco #bandainamco
